root: ^Makra as been gone for a long time, do you think she's okay?
^I hope so, we found mostly nothing on our end.
^Speak for yourself! I found everything you asked me to buy for the heist!
^Yell it harder, I don't think the guards heard you!
^Girls please... oh Makra is coming back!
^Have you found anything about Cassandra Cheese?
^Yes, the web of information is present here, so I  asked them for info on her whereabouts, but I had to spend all of my share on it.
^Yuki she asked bandits to burn our house down! We can't have pity now.
^I know, I'm just... I don't know unsure...
^You can back down if you want, but we need you.
^I'm still unsure myself, Yuki, but she does not deserve her wealth if she needs to destroy the little we had.
^Yeah.. I guess... Plus I couldn't live with myself if I let you all down now!
^Perfect! Makra what do you have for us?
^The cheese family is transporting a huge about of resources to a village via train. But it needs to pass here and towards our home to get there.
^Will there be gold in this transport?
^As far as I know there might be some treasures,  but yes there's also food with the basic resources.
^So we should prioritise the resources to rebuild our home first, the treasures and food are optional.
^That's fine with me. But there's another thing the web told me.
^The guards are looking for us in the market, we will need to be careful while getting the rest of our material for the heist.
^Did they hear us or something? How are they here?
^Never mind why, we need to protect ourselves before more come!
